import React, {Component} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import BookImage from '../../asserts/js/images' export class SearchItem extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) } convertShortIntro(intro) { let shortIntro = '' for (let i = 0; i < 200; i++) shortIntro += intro[i] return shortIntro } render() { return (

{this.props.title}

See Detail
Availability: {this.props.availability}
Short intro: {this.convertShortIntro(this.props.summary)}
) } }
